locations.name: Kalahari Desert Region
locations.description: An expansive semi-arid savanna known for its stark beauty, red sands, unique wildlife (including black-maned lions and meerkats), and exceptional stargazing due to dark skies.

locations.name: Cape Town
locations.description: A vibrant port city dramatically situated between Table Mountain and the Atlantic Ocean, known for its cultural diversity, historical significance, stunning natural scenery, and cosmopolitan atmosphere.

locations.name: Franschhoek
locations.description: A picturesque historical town nestled in a valley within the Cape Winelands, celebrated for its Huguenot heritage, world-class wineries, gourmet restaurants, and stunning mountain backdrop.
